title: bAjat murali
sahitya:
bAjat murali murAri sundar jamunA kinArE rAsrang gvAl bAl sang madan pyArE


caraNam 1    timk bhAl prEmajAl lasat jaisE candrabAl savarO dayavishAl muktamAl dhArE
    caraNam 2    dEva banda pada mukunda mOhanO Ananda vrnda gOpikA cakOr canda nanda kE dulArE
    caraNam 3    kOTakAntan lalAma tIn lOknAth shyAm gAvat shruti jAkE nAm bhakata kAntArE
